EnumerationType.description: Parent Type for all Work Effort enum types
Parent Type for all Workflow enum types

Enumeration.description: Network structure restricted to proper nesting of LOOP
Network structure restricted to proper nesting of SPLIT/JOIN and LOOP
Parameter Used for Input and Output
Activity can only be instantiated once (DEFAULT)
Activity can be instantiated multiple times
Synchronize all incoming transitions (wait for all)
No incoming synchronization required (start on first)
Only allow a single outgoing transition
While loop - go until condition evaluates to false
Repeat Until loop - go until condition evaluates to true

WorkflowParticipantType.description: Specifies a role that may map to a group of humans
Department or other unit in an organization
Human interacting with the system through an application
